short_description: a&l doors and hardware is a windows & door shop based in new york, united states.
long_description: as one of new york region's premier source for sales and installation of doors and hardware, a&l doors and hardware has been serving contractors since 1988. we are prepared to meet any specifications needed, and are approved by new york city's department of housing preservation & development and school construction authority. if you're looking for a knowledgeable and professional team to help with your next project, give us a call today. a wide selection of doors, frames, and hardware for fast delivery. get the highest quality products and workmansship for any size job. a&l doors and hardware is new york's premier source for sales and installation of doors and hardware. in addition to custom manufacturing, we offer a wide selection of standard steel and wood doors and frames, including hollow metal, stainless steel, and galvanized, as well as solid and hollow core, prefinished, firerated, and prehung wood. we also carry an extensive range of hardware from manufacturers including arrow, yale, norton, and sargent.
other_emails: joe@aldoors.net | mark@aldoors.net | henry@aldoors.net | garry@aldoors.net | avi@aldoors.net | leo@aldoors.net | sam@aldoors.net
generated_description: a&l doors and hardware is a company based in new york that specializes in the sales and installation of doors and hardware. they offer a wide range of standard steel and wood doors and frames, including hollow metal, stainless steel, and galvanized, as well as solid and hollow core, prefinished, firerated, and prehung wood. they also carry an extensive range of hardware from manufacturers such as arrow, yale, norton, and sargent. with a 10,000 sq. ft. warehouse and in-house manufacturing facility, they provide architectural submittal services such as takeoffs, door and hardware schedules, shop drawings, and catalog cut sheets. their experts can provide architectural drawings and door schedules that cover every detail concerning doors, frames, and hardware, whether using standard products or custom manufactured doors.
